lead_paragraph: An entry in the N.F.L. Injury Report on Monday reversed the outcome of the San Diego-Denver game, during which running back LaDainian Tomlinson of the Chargers was bothered by a jammed toe. Denver won.
snippet: An entry in the N.F.L. Injury Report on Monday reversed the outcome of the San Diego-Denver game, during which running back LaDainian Tomlinson of the Chargers was bothered by a jammed toe. Denver won.
